recipe.title: Champagne Grapes
ingredients: 3 cups dry Champagne or sparkling wine at room temperature
1 tbsp lemon zest, plus more for garnish
instructions: Cut grapes into small clusters of 2 to 4 grapes each. Pour Champagne into a plastic bowl with a tight-fitting lid. Add granulated sugar and zest; stir gently until sugar dissolves. Add grapes, cover and chill 8 hours. Pour off marinade. Dry grapes on a paper towel; sprinkle with superfine sugar and zest.
